highlightedProjects.description: Procfy is a financial system designed to simplify financial management for small and medium-sized businesses. With over 5,000 users, this project aims to streamline financial administration for enterprises.
myContributions: Responsible for reviewing all code going to the develop branch and performing deployments.
Conducted audits of automated tests, ensuring code quality.
Developed a text editor in JavaScript that compiles into HTML and generates PDFs, handling node splitting to avoid overflow.
Contributed to the creation of almost all system screens.
Created the entire graphing system that displays the financial movements of the companies.
elementsToObserve: Text editor with HTML compilation and PDF generation.
impactAndResults: The text editor took about a month to finalize and provided significant learning opportunities.
The system serves over 5,000 users, providing an effective tool for business financial management.

highlightedProjects.description: This is a personal project where I developed my online resume, learning and implementing Next.js.
myContributions: Developed the locales and static rendering.
Used TailwindCSS for styling and Next.js for rendering.
impactAndResults: A personal project demonstrating my skills in Next.js and TailwindCSS.

highlightedProjects.description: Developing a website with a blog for a client, focusing on SEO optimization and client acquisition.
myContributions: Structured imperative designs with effective CTAs and SEO for optimized keywords.
Developed conversion funnels to optimize client acquisition.
impactAndResults: The project is in development but already demonstrates good SEO and design practices.
